author: Louise Hall, Louise Hall
title: Coronavirus: Police officer who died from Covid-19 was denied test for virus twice
description: When Marylou Armer finally received diagnosis 'it was already too late', says sister
content:
A Californiapolice detective who died of coronavirus requested to be tested twice for the disease and was denied, according to a report.
Marylou Armer, a 43-year-old detective with the Santa Rosa Police Department was allegedly told by doctors that her age a… [+2431 chars]
